column7: Advanced individual study in a subject related to Information Sciences not covered in normal course offerings. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor. "Request to Enroll in IS Independent Study”. Restricted to students with Junior level standing or above.
